entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 1 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
